author: SetTrend
body:
I noticed that right-clicking a `.ps1` file doesn't provide a PowerShell 7 context menu entry like ... - `PowerShell 7 > Run script`, or - `PowerShell 7 > Run script as Administrator`.
Could you please add such feature to the installer?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Does anybody know Windows or WiX API for the feature?

comments.author: codingfunwoody
comments.body: I also missed the context menus shortcut by choco installation

title: Please add a "Run with PowerShell 7" context menu
